author: UltPanda
name: AdvancedLoL
short: Advanced League of Legends integration with live games and detailed stats
description: A comprehensive League of Legends cog that provides live game monitoring, detailed summoner profiles, match history analysis, and champion mastery tracking. Features include real-time game updates, automatic live game notifications, advanced statistics, and champion icon integration.
install_msg: Thanks for installing AdvancedLoL! Use `[p]lol setkey <your_riot_api_key>` to get started. Get your API key from https://developer.riotgames.com/
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Riot API keys and guild configuration settings. No user data is permanently stored.
